command

Interface ICommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Command, GameLoopEnabledCommand, LoadNextLevelCommand, SetDifficultyCommand, SetPlayerNameCommand, SetViewStateCommand, StartNewGameCommand, SubmitHighscoreCommand, UpdateGameStateCommand

    public interface ICommand
    The command interface that commands must implement. Nothing more than the execute method is needed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command chain(Command cmd) 
      void execute()
      Executes the command

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute()
        Executes the command

      • chain

        Command chain(Command cmd)
        Parameters:
        cmd - Command to be executed just after executing this Command instance
        Returns:
        returns the first command to be executed chain enables chaining of multiple command into one single executable Command. For this concept to work it is, however, VERY(!) important that all Command subclasses call "super.execute()" just before their own .execute() exits.
